terms.Explanation: In this verse from the Brah: known and applicable in all circumstances or contexts. This indicates that the subject matter being discussed or the principle being expounded upon is universally recognized and accepted.

theme: सर्वं खल्विदं ब्रह्म तज्जलानिति शान्त उपासीत(छान्दो. ३-१४-१)
meaning: Meaning: Due to the famous instruction, it is known or applicable everywhere.
